alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 9:06PM MST until November 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Snowfall of 3 to 5 inches is expected around South Pass. Winds gusting from 35 to 50 mph in exposed areas. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains, including South Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute, including over South Pass. Blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibility to a quarter mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
